channel.title: Banned for 1 day Just because of 1 stupid letter -.-
channel.description:
When i was selling a d battle axe this guy was trying to scam by saying You can Trim armor.
I forgot to put the T in cant so i said:
me: (scammer) im reporting you! me: you can trim armor me: cant*
[url=http://www.putfile.com/pic.php?img=3263199]http://www.putfile.com/pic.php?img=3263199[/url]
:mad: Wtf Jagex? i got banned because i just mispelt cant? And not even that i was helping jagex and i put the word cant under it!?
This shows how stupid they are...
I have NEVER broke a rule and wtf this??
Thanks to them i have to Type carefully now...-.-
Also id just like to warn you try not to mispell words like that
